rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
Segment does not contain a moderate verb paired with explicit scale or impact information.
The segment does not contain a question.
The segment reports positive facts but lacks explicit calming language from the source.
Segment does not contain a minimiser + scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes impact/statistics (low number, non-fatal) ('only two cases... and neither were fatal').
The segment reports case numbers ('only two cases') using a standard verb ('have been').
